subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: With their 4-1 defeat of the Buffalo Sabres, the Rangers became only the fifth N.H.L. team to reach the milestone of 2,500 regular-season wins.
snippet: With their 4-1 defeat of the Buffalo Sabres, the Rangers became only the fifth N.H.L. team to reach the milestone of 2,500 regular-season wins.
